title: USDC Stablecoin’s Issuer Circle Dumps Tron Network; TRX Steady
description: Circle cited its “risk management” framework as part of the decision, among other factors.

title: Can This Token Priced at $0.12 Be the Next Solana (SOL)?
description: Identifying the next Solana (SOL) – a token that has seen exponential growth and garnered widespread attention – is the goal of many investors. With Retik Finance priced at a modest $0.12, there’s speculation as to whether it could be the next SOL.  Understanding Retik Finance (RETIK) Retik Finance is a decentralized finance (DeFi) project […]

title: Polygon Revolutionizes Identity Verification with Palm Recognition Technology
description: In a move to reshape identity verification in Web3 applications, Polygon, in collaboration with Animoca Brands and The Human Institute, unveiled Humanity Protocol on Polygon chain Development Kit (CDK), integrating palm recognition technology as a cutting-edge solution. This initiative aims to establish Proof of Humanity while addressing concerns about invasive identity verification methods, such as […]
